item.title: meditation now
item.description: 09:59 Saturday 05 November 2016 JST This is my fourth time recently to join the “evening sit” (which happens in the mornings for me). 11:09 Saturday 05 November 2016 JST It actually finished more quickly than I expected. It was an hour, but felt shorter than previous hours.

item.title: Meditation down by river
item.description: 09:13 Sunday 17 January 2016 JST Esther and I went to the river near the meditation center for a 20 minute meditation. I stared across the river at a rock on the other side. Noticed how the stream was literally the archetype of the imagery for “stream of thoughts” as the water flows by.

item.title: Meditation timer finally finally done
item.description: ##17:15 Saturday 14 March 2015 JST## Two years ago I decided I would make a meditation time for iOS so I could inspire myself to meditate daily. It took ten days (according to git) and had all the features I needed: set the desired countdown time, count down, then count up after the time had finished! That way, if I was having a good meditation, I could keep going and know how long I continued!

item.title: daily meditation thread
item.description: ##18:50 Tuesday 17 February 2015 JST## Yesterday, someone was like, “I’ll give anyone 500 bits to make some more givaways” so I made a thread on /u/BitTippers encouraging people to meditate. Decided to make it a daily thing. I wonder how long it will last! ##21:45 Nice, I just got a tip for 500 bits; that should pay for a few more days at least!
